tooltips.forgermod.gemstone_upgrade_temp:
§7This template is used to upgrade weapons
with gemstones increasing specific weapon stats.

Upgrade weapons at the Infusion Table!§r
tooltips.forgermod.ancient_upgrade_templ:
§7This template is used to forge advanced
weapons like claymores.

Forge weapons in the Forge!§r
tooltips.forgermod.claymore.tooltip:
§7A long Sword made from the best
Materials you found on your adventures

Can be upgraded with any kind of
§r§dsupreme Material.§r
tooltips.forgermod.rusty_claymore.toolti:
§7It looks like a claymore, but it's
extremely rusty, it barely even cuts
through grass. It must have been forged
hundrets of years ago.

Can be restored.§r
tooltips.forgermod.infernal_claymore.too:
§7A blazing claymore usually found in
ancient nether structures, made by
the ancients.

Effect on hit: Glowing I for 100 Seconds§r
§7A dark and cool-looking claymore usually
found in the end, deep in the void.

Effect on hit: Blindness I for 4 Seconds§r§r
tooltips.forgermod.overgrown_claymore.to:
§7A very old claymore which must have
been in a lush cave for a very long
time.

Effect on hit: Hunger III for 10 Seconds§r§r
tooltips.forgermod.hollow_claymore.toolt:
§7A claymore reinforced by bones from
the enemies it killed. A truely scary
sword to have.

Effect on hit: Weakness III for 5 Seconds§r§r
tooltips.forgermod.curseblood_claymore.t:
§7A bloody claymore cursed by all the
enemies it defeated. It's being said
that it belonged to a psycopath long
ago.

Effect on hit: Wither II for 4 Seconds§r§r
tooltips.forgermod.dreambound_claymore.t:
§7A claymore sending enemies to eternal
rest. A claymore known as deadly as
death itself, and often used for killing
people while they are asleep.

Effect on hit: Nausea IV for 4 Seconds§r§r
tooltips.forgermod.shrieking_claymore.to:
§7A claymore found in the deepest depths,
reinforced with sculk, a material
from another dimension.

Effect on hit: Darkness V for 7 Seconds§r§r
tooltips.forgermod.claymore_of_thunder.t:
§7A claymore charged by the might of
lightning, 1,000,000 volts of electricity
flow through this blade electrifieng
everyone coming too close.

Effect on hit: Slowness III for 5 Seconds§r§r
tooltips.forgermod.storming_claymore.too:
§7A claymore found at high altitudes, due
to the high wind speeds blowing everything
away.

Effect on hit: Levitation II for 3 Seconds§r§r
tooltips.forgermod.inanisium_ingot.toolt:
§7A supreme material found in the void,
where nothing else is able to exist.§r
tooltips.forgermod.ignisium_ingot.toolti:
§7A supreme material found deep in the
nether, mostly submerged in lava
and magma.§r
tooltips.forgermod.pulsite_ingot.tooltip:
§7A supreme material found in the deepest
depths, in a very dark environment§r
tooltips.forgermod.somnium_ingot.tooltip:
§7A supreme material that can only be
imagined. It may appear in your 
dreams.§r
tooltips.forgermod.vulnusium_ingot.toolt:
§7A supreme material found deep in the flesh of undead monsters, where blood
crystalises to a very strong material.§r
tooltips.forgermod.morsium_ingot.tooltip:
§7A supreme material found deep in the
Soulsand Valleys, mostly under a pile
of bones and remnants.§r
tooltips.forgermod.lush_ingot.tooltip:
§7A supreme material found mostly in
Lush Caves, where plants are 
thriving, and new live emerges.§r
tooltips.forgermod.electrium_ingot.toolt:
§7A supreme material charged up by a
highly energised lighting strike, it 
may even be in creepers, making them
able to charge up.§r
tooltips.forgermod.taifunite_ingot.toolt:
§7A supreme material grinded, and
refined by the endless storms and
strong winds blowing on high
altitudes.§r
tooltips.forgermod.developium_ingot.tool:
§7A supreme material made up by the
genius (BananasHelp20), who made the
mod, in cooperation with
ALLESBANANE11§r

§dCreative only§r
tooltips.forgermod.carbon_steel_cross_gu:
§7A good sword needs a cross guard,
protecting the owner from hits of
enemies.§r
tooltips.forgermod.sharpened_blade.toolt:
§7A blade sharpened till all of the
fingers bleed, the smith of this
blade must have been extremely
focused on sharpening the blade.§r
tooltips.forgermod.handle.tooltip:
§7This handle is used for more advanced
weapons, than the regular ones. Its
could say it's very hard and stable.
stick§r
tooltips.forgermod.advanced_handle.toolt:
§7This handle is used for the best
weapons imaginable, extremely stable,
and very comfortable to hold.§r
tooltips.forgermod.amethyst.tooltip:
§7A very dense and fine variant of the
amethyst found in geodes, it's absolutely
flawless.

When applied to a Weapon:§r§5 +4 Attack Speed§r
tooltips.forgermod.amber.tooltip:
§7It burns your finger upon touching it.
Its a flawless, yet extremely hot stone
and you've never seen something like it
before.

When applied to a Weapon:
§r§6makes item fire resistant§r
tooltips.forgermod.ruby.tooltip:
§7A sharp and edgy stone. It's shining
as red as the blood your enemies
bleed when killed with a very sharp
weapon.

When applied to a Weapon:§r§4 +1 Damage§r
tooltips.forgermod.jade.tooltip:
§7A very precious jewel, which gives you
the feeling that it could bring up the true
potential of any supreme weapon.

When applied to a Weapon:§r
§2+1 Effect Amplifier
+1 Second Effect Duration§r
tooltips.forgermod.amber.tooltip_extra:
§7
Gemstone: [§r§6Amber§r§7]
Gemstone bonus:§r§6 Item fire resistance§r
tooltips.forgermod.jade.tooltip_extra:
§7
Gemstone: [§r§2Jade§r§7]
Gemstone bonus:§r
§2+1 Effect Amplifier
+1 Second Effect Duration§r
